snippet: The Constitutional Responsibility Project, formed to lead the fight to get Judge Merrick B. Garland confirmed, is a virtual who’s who of Mr. Obama’s two presidential campaigns.
abstract: Team of Pres Obama's former aides has formed nonprofit Constitutional Responsibility Project, which has as its aim campaign to compel Senate Republicans to confirm Obama's Supreme Court nominee Judge Merrick B Garland; group is essentially miniature version of Obama's 2012 campaign apparatus.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and ERIC LIPTON

lead_paragraph: The Constitutional Responsibility Project, formed to lead the fight to get Judge Merrick B. Garland confirmed, is a virtual who’s who of Mr. Obama’s two presidential campaigns.

headline.main: Obama Mobilizes Campaign Veterans to Push for Court Nominee
headline.print_headline: Obama Mobilizes Campaign Veterans to Push for Supreme Court Nominee
